issue.message: The id "main_drawer" in layout "activity_instant_example_main" is missing from the following layout configurations: layout-xlarge (present in layout)

The image `document.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/document.png: 72x98 dp (108x147 px), drawable-mdpi/document.png: 72x98 dp (72x98 px), drawable-xhdpi/document.png: 72x98 dp (144x196 px), drawable-xxhdpi/document.png: 96x131 dp (288x392 px)

The project references RTL attributes, but does not explicitly enable or disable RTL support with `android:supportsRtl` in the manifest
